description: Book titles checklist shows title content for each book in the range

expectedBehavior.markerDetection: Only paragraph markers with scTitle text type are extracted
expectedBehavior.referenceAssignment: Reference is always start of book (e.g., GEN 1:1, EXO 1:1)
expectedBehavior.titleContent: Full text content of all title paragraphs for the book
expectedBehavior.missingTitle: If no title markers present, shows 'No Book Title Present'

verificationNotes: One row per book in the selected range
Reference always starts at beginning of book (not start of range)
All title markers (\mt, \mt1, \mt2, etc.) combined into single cell
Missing titles show explicit 'No Book Title Present' message
Range starting mid-book still shows title for that book
